title: Mercury Transit in the 7th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 7th house for Scorpio Ascendant, communication becomes central in partnerships, marriage, and business dealings. Dialogue, negotiation, and mutual understanding influence relationship outcomes. There is a strong tendency to analyze partners’ words and intentions, which can improve clarity but also create overthinking. Business agreements and contracts require careful discussion. When used consciously, this transit supports intelligent negotiation, balanced partnerships, and clear agreements without mental games or excessive doubt.
closing: This Mercury transit tests Scorpio Ascendants through dialogue and partnership logic. Success comes from clarity without overanalysis.
